fields.label: Quick Help
fields.options:
✨ Quick setup guide (click to expand)

What is this? This page lets you configure a bot for your Dentist app. It’s simple: fill the basics, pick behavior, and save.

  • Project Name — short name for where the bot is used. The newest bot appears first and is considered "priority".
  • Employee Name + Avatar — shown in the chat widget.
  • Bot Color — affects chat accents.
  • Mention Bot Name — if ON, the bot occasionally mentions its name.
  • Tone & Personality — high-level behavior presets.
  • Target Action — what the bot is for (you can choose multiple).
  • Special Instructions & Core Principles — flexible rules. Use them for must-follow guidelines.
  • Forbidden Topics — hard restrictions. The bot will avoid them.
  • Messages (JSON) — greeting/error/farewell in multiple languages, e.g. {"en":"Hello"}.
  • AI Model — pick how smart/fast the bot should be.

That’s it. Most setups take under a minute. You can tweak anytime.
